mapper.sql: CZY01, RYXX01, RYXM, CZYMM, GSXX01, BM01, AZWD01, WDMC, QSRQ, ZZRQ, ZT, CCRQ, ZXBJ
mapper.select:
SELECT
from jl_account where 1=1 and czy01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.czy01},'%') and ryxx01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.ryxx01},'%') and ryxm like CONCAT('%',#{param.ryxm},'%') and czymm like CONCAT('%',#{param.czymm},'%') and gsxx01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.gsxx01},'%') and bm01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.bm01},'%') and azwd01 like CONCAT('%',#{param.azwd01},'%') and wdmc like CONCAT('%',#{param.wdmc},'%') and qsrq like CONCAT('%',#{param.qsrq},'%') and zzrq like CONCAT('%',#{param.zzrq},'%') and zt like CONCAT('%',#{param.zt},'%') and ccrq like CONCAT('%',#{param.ccrq},'%') and zxbj like CONCAT('%',#{param.zxbj},'%')

SELECT t.CZY01 userAccount,t.RYXM userName,t.CZYMM userPassword,2 fromType, t.GSXX01 companyId,t.ZT as userState, (SELECT name FROM hx_organization_unload WHERE id=AZWD01) companyName, t1.position_id sysPositionId,t2.position_name sysPositionName,t2.org_id as orgId FROM jl_account t LEFT JOIN hx_user_position t1 ON t1.from_type=2 AND t.CZY01=t1.user_login_name LEFT JOIN hx_position t2 ON t1.position_id=t2.position_code WHERE CZY01 = #{czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into jl_account (CZY01, RYXX01, RYXM, CZYMM, GSXX01, BM01, AZWD01, WDMC, QSRQ, ZZRQ, ZT, CCRQ, ZXBJ) values (#{czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bm01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{azwd01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ccrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zxbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into jl_account
CZY01,
RYXX01,
RYXM,
CZYMM,
GSXX01,
BM01,
AZWD01,
WDMC,
QSRQ,
ZZRQ,
ZT,
CCRQ,
ZXBJ,

#{ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update jl_account
CZY01 = #{record.czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RYXX01 = #{record.ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RYXM = #{record.ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CZYMM = #{record.czymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GSXX01 = #{record.gsxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BM01 = #{record.bm01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AZWD01 = #{record.azwd01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WDMC = #{record.wdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QSRQ = #{record.qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZZRQ = #{record.zzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZT = #{record.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CCRQ = #{record.ccrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZXBJ = #{record.zxbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update jl_account set CZY01 = #{record.czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXX01 = #{record.ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXM = #{record.ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZYMM = #{record.czymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GSXX01 = #{record.gsxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BM01 = #{record.bm01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AZWD01 = #{record.azwd01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDMC = #{record.wdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QSRQ = #{record.qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZZRQ = #{record.zzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{record.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CCRQ = #{record.ccrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZXBJ = #{record.zxbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update jl_account
RYXX01 = #{ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RYXM = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CZYMM = #{czymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GSXX01 = #{gsxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BM01 = #{bm01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AZWD01 = #{azwd01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WDMC = #{wdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QSRQ = #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZZRQ = #{zzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CCRQ = #{ccrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZXBJ = #{zxbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where CZY01 = #{czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jl_account set RYXX01 = #{ryxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXM = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CZYMM = #{czymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GSXX01 = #{gsxx01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BM01 = #{bm01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AZWD01 = #{azwd01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDMC = #{wdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QSRQ = #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZZRQ = #{zzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CCRQ = #{ccrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZXBJ = #{zxbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where CZY01 = #{czy01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
